name: My Next Pet Will Be Good
name_original: My Next Pet Will Be Good
description:
Select the perfect mutant, and when you think it's ready, put it through the Envirator, an Environmental Accelerator that will stimulate the evolution of your species and give you the Perfect Pet.

  • State of the art microbiology
  • Based on real genetics
  • This is definitely of science works, trust me
  • Get a unique Pet from 30+ endings

WARNING : Not Scientifically Accurate.

Use the mouse for everything. Right click will bring the default cursor back.
Use the trash to get rid of the "result" Petri Dish once you're done.

Made in 3 days using Game Maker for the Virtual Pet jam.
